forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Light Snow then Slight Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and patchy fog before 8am, then snow and patchy fog between 8am and 9am, then a chance of rain and patchy fog between 9am and 10am, then a chance of rain showers and patchy fog between 10am and 11am, then a chance of snow showers and patchy fog between 11am and noon, then a chance of rain showers between noon and 5pm, then a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 41, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Clear
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 26. West wind 17 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The morning in Boston unfolds under a shroud of mist and damp chill, a reminder of the season's unpredictable charm. Rain whispers against windows before giving way to tentative snowflakes, each struggling against the gusty winds that swirl through the streets, tempering hope with a brisk chill. As temperatures hover near the mid-30s, the day presents an impression of muted gray, with low clouds sealing off any vivid hints of sunlight, creating a landscape of somber beauty. Although the rain may initially relent, the lingering fog and possibility of scattered snow showers take center stage, making for a day best suited for indoor comfort rather than outdoor exploration.

As twilight approaches and the sun withdraws beneath a blanket of clouds, the weather will settle into a calmer, yet still refreshing night. The winds will maintain their brisk pace, urging commuters to layer up against the cold. A heavier coat, perhaps knit gloves, and a warm hat will serve any evening traveler well. While the scenery may not entice one to stroll along the riverbanks, it's a perfect opportunity to settle in with a good book or seek out a cozy café, savoring a warm drink as the city wraps itself in a quieter evening glow. Indeed, it is a day that invites introspection, a thoughtful pause as the world temporarily slows its pace.
